name: Gruntwurk
description:
Hey, Grunt, welcome back to work. Seems like you've been sick for a while and we've all had to do our own chores, it's been terrible.

Now hurry up, you don't want to make the Bossman angry.

-----------

This was my first ever Jam, the game has a lot of flaws and bugs but I hope it can bring some enjoyment :) Thanks for giving it a go.

I've learned a lot and next time I can and will do better.
